html: <tooldrawer-field-content-timer-mode group-label='Timer type' type='choice-tiles' size='md' path='timer.mode' label='Select timer type' value='{{timer.mode}}' options='[{"label":"Countdown to Date","value":"date","icon":"calendar"},{"label":"Personal Countdown","value":"personal","icon":"person"},{"label":"Number Counter","value":"number","icon":"plus"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-timer-personal group-label='Personal countdown' type='valuefield' size='md' path='timer.timeAmount' label='Time amount' value='{{timer.timeAmount}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-timer-personal group-label='Personal countdown' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='timer.timeUnit' label='Time unit' value='{{timer.timeUnit}}' options='[{"label":"Hours","value":"hours"},{"label":"Minutes","value":"minutes"},{"label":"Days","value":"days"},{"label":"Weeks","value":"weeks"},{"label":"Months","value":"months"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-timer-personal group-label='Personal countdown' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='timer.repeat' label='Repeat' value='{{timer.repeat}}' options='[{"label":"Never","value":"never"},{"label":"1 minute","value":"1 minute"},{"label":"5 minutes","value":"5 minutes"},{"label":"1 hour","value":"1 hour"},{"label":"1 day","value":"1 day"},{"label":"1 week","value":"1 week"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-timer-number group-label='Number counter' type='valuefield' size='md' path='timer.targetNumber' label='Target number' value='{{timer.targetNumber}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-timer-number group-label='Number counter' type='valuefield' size='md' path='timer.startingNumber' label='Starting number' value='{{timer.startingNumber}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-timer-number group-label='Number counter' type='valuefield' size='md' path='timer.countDuration' label='Count duration (seconds)' value='{{timer.countDuration}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-content-headline group-label='Headline' type='dropdown-edit' size='lg' path='timer.headline' label='Headline text' placeholder='Add headline' />

<tooldrawer-field-layout-settings group-label='Layout' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='layout.position' label='Position' value='{{layout.position}}' options='[{"label":"Inline","value":"inline"},{"label":"Full width","value":"full-width"},{"label":"Top bar","value":"top-bar"},{"label":"Bottom bar","value":"bottom-bar"},{"label":"Static top","value":"static-top"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-theme group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.theme' label='Theme' value='{{appearance.theme}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-theme group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.animation' label='Animation' value='{{appearance.animation}}' options='[{"label":"Fade","value":"fade"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-settings group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color' path='appearance.textColor' label='Text color' value='{{appearance.textColor}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-settings group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.separator' label='Separator' value='{{appearance.separator}}' options='[{"label":"Colon","value":":"},{"label":"Slash","value":"/"},{"label":"Dash","value":"-"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color,gradient' path='appearance.itemBackground' label='Timer tile background' value='{{appearance.itemBackground}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked' label='Link timer tile corners' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radius' label='Corner radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radius}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == true" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusTL' label='Tile top-left radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusTL}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusTR' label='Tile top-right radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusTR}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusBR' label='Tile bottom-right radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusBR}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusBL' label='Tile bottom-left radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusBL}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-border' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.border' label='Timer tile border' value='{{appearance.itemCard.border}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.shadow' label='Timer tile shadow' value='{{appearance.itemCard.shadow}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='Stage/Pod' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color,gradient,image,video' path='stage.background' label='Background' value='{{stage.background}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='Stage/Pod' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color,gradient,image,video' path='pod.background' label='Pod background' value='{{pod.background}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='Stage/Pod' type='dropdown-border' size='md' path='appearance.podBorder' label='Pod border' value='{{appearance.podBorder}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-actions-during group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='actions.during.type' label='Action type' value='{{actions.during.type}}' options='[{"label":"Link","value":"link"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-actions-during group-label='' type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.during.url' label='URL' value='{{actions.during.url}}' placeholder='https://example.com' />
<tooldrawer-field-actions-during group-label='' type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.during.text' label='Button text' value='{{actions.during.text}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-actions-during group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='actions.during.style' label='Button style' value='{{actions.during.style}}' options='[{"label":"Primary","value":"primary"},{"label":"Secondary","value":"secondary"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-actions-during group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='actions.during.newTab' label='Open in new tab' />

<tooldrawer-field-actions-after group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='actions.after.type' label='Action type' value='{{actions.after.type}}' options='[{"label":"Hide timer","value":"hide"},{"label":"Link","value":"link"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-actions-after group-label='' type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.after.url' label='URL' value='{{actions.after.url}}' show-if="actions.after.type == 'link'" placeholder='https://example.com' />
<tooldrawer-field-actions-after group-label='' type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.after.text' label='Link text' value='{{actions.after.text}}' show-if="actions.after.type == 'link'" />
<tooldrawer-field-behavior-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.showBacklink' label='Show backlink' />
<tooldrawer-field-settings-seo group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='seoGeo.enabled' label='Enable SEO/GEO optimization' />
